DOC.brief_title: An Open Study Assess Robustness CRC749 Inhaler
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males female least 12 year age . 2 . A clinical diagnosis least 12 week prior screen asthma COPD stable treatment . 3 . Spirometry follow salbutamol show FEV1 ≥40 % predict normal FEV1/FVC ratio < 0.7 COPD subject . 4 . Spirometry without salbutamol show FEV1 ≥50 % predict normal asthma subject . 5 . Ability use CRC749 inhaler . 1 . Other chronic active respiratory disorder symptom , treatment COPD asthma exacerbation 28 day precede screening . 2 . History long QT syndrome screen ECG QTcF great 480 millisecond . 3 . Current evidence , history within 6 month prior screen unstable ischemic heart disease , NYHA Class III/IV leave ventricular failure , myocardial infarction . 4 . Subjects Advair ( R ) Diskus ( R ) / Seretide ( R ) Accuhaler ( R ) contraindicate .
